body: @ndus ah shit now that makes sense why there's wrecked car on second page. This is disgusting, i want to read translated version now lol
oh this is so fucked up, i need an english version

Between a little bit of machine translation and guesswork, the gist of it seems to be this. The son finds video evidence of his mother cheating, which he's watching on his phone right before the wreck. The accident kills the father and renders the son a quadruple amputee with serious brain damage, but apparently he still has enough wherewithal to fantasize about blackmailing his mother into boning him. In reality, he *kinda* gets his wish since his mother ends up using him as a living sex toy instead of getting him proper care.
This is the most disturbing shit i’ve seen this week and I cannot unseen.
